snippet: Serena Williams beat Olga Govortsova, 7-5, 6-0, to give the United States a 2-0 lead over Belarus in a Fed Cup tie in Worcester, Mass.
abstract: Serena Williams beats Olga Govortsova, 7-5, 6-0, to give the United States a 2-0 lead over Belarus in a Fed Cup tie in Worcester, Mass; other tennis results noted.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams beat Olga Govortsova, 7-5, 6-0, to give the United States a 2-0 lead over Belarus in a Fed Cup tie in Worcester, Mass.
